snippet: San Antonio, coming off its second-worst home loss ever, beat Oklahoma City in a game between the conference’s top two teams.
abstract: San Antonio Spurs beat Oklahoma City Thunder, 105-93.
lead_paragraph: San Antonio, coming off its second-worst home loss ever, beat Oklahoma City in a game between the conference’s top two teams.

headline.main: Spurs Regroup and Stay Atop West
headline.print_headline: Spurs Regroup and Stay Atop West
